title: a number of push tests (4?) started to fail at 20210720 on windows with some recent annex changes
body:
```shell
$> git grep datalad.core.distributed.tests.test_push.test_gh1426 | grep release | grep windows                            
...
cron-20210719/build-windows.yaml-321-69466103-failed/test-datalad (release)/21_Run datalad tests.txt:2021-07-19T04:06:18.7313658Z datalad.core.distributed.tests.test_push.test_gh1426 ... ok
cron-20210720/build-windows.yaml-322-69466103-failed/3_test-datalad (release).txt:2021-07-20T04:07:27.9583842Z datalad.core.distributed.tests.test_push.test_gh1426 ... ERROR
...
```
see e.g. https://github.com/datalad/git-annex/runs/3130519727?check_suite_focus=true

so might be some regression or change in behavior of annex (ping @joeyh)

edit, forgot to paste a full list:
```
(git)smaug:…lds/2021/07[master]cron-20210722/build-windows.yaml-324-69466103-failed
$> git grep 'ERROR:'                                                                                                      
1_test-datalad (master).txt:2021-07-22T04:51:00.2969878Z ERROR: File C:\Users\runneradmin\AppData\Local\Temp\datalad_temp_l3q9itaa\providers\exists.cfg already exists, choose another name
1_test-datalad (master).txt:2021-07-22T04:51:00.3083408Z ERROR: Provided regular expression doesn't match original url.  Please re-enter
1_test-datalad (master).txt:2021-07-22T06:21:28.4388312Z ERROR: datalad.core.distributed.tests.test_push.test_push_git_annex_branch_many_paths_same_data
1_test-datalad (master).txt:2021-07-22T06:21:28.4422379Z ERROR: datalad.core.distributed.tests.test_push.test_push_matching
1_test-datalad (master).txt:2021-07-22T06:21:28.4451783Z ERROR: datalad.core.distributed.tests.test_push.test_gh1426
1_test-datalad (master).txt:2021-07-22T06:21:28.4482878Z ERROR: datalad.core.distributed.tests.test_push.test_gh1763
...
```
